actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Act of April 7, 1956, relating to the lower Rio Grande rehabilitation project, Texas, Mercedes Division.

summary.text: Authorizes the Hidalgo and Cameron Counties (Texas) Water Control and Improvement District to construct a water metering system, a pumping plant, and to provide for replacement of pumps and meters for the Rio Grande rehabilitation project, Mercedes division.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of April 7, 1956, relating to the lower Rio Grande rehabilitation project, Texas, Mercedes Division.
